title: Malpertuis.1971.HarryKumel.DirectorsCut.RipByDahlmann
description:
Very Strange movie, not really horror but well worth seeing especially if you're a bit into 70's experimental stuff.

The story centers on a sailor who returns to shore to discover that his uncle has been capturing dying Greek gods and sewing them into human flesh. He then holds them hostage on an Ionian isle. Trouble ensues when the sailor falls in love with the Gorgon. ~ (Sandra Brennan, All Movie Guide)


Also Known As:
Malpertuis: Histoire d'une maison maudite (Belgium: French title)
Malpertuis: The Legend of Doom House
The Legend of Doom House (USA)

This is in the original Dutch language, English subs are seperately included.
Audio look like it's a bit off but it's the original dub, hey, it was early seventies.
